1#
An egg in which Cute Pet Child Admin Beta is sleeping.
Can be hatched with [Pet Incubator].
If Intimacy is Neutral, Physical/Magic damage +3% on monsters of Farm Lost Valley field and Sewage Treatment Plant field.
If Intimacy is Cordial, Physical/Magic damage +6% on monsters of Farm Lost Valley field and Sewage Treatment Plant field.
If Intimacy is Loyal, Physical/Magic damage +10% on monsters of Farm Lost Valley field and Sewage Treatment Plant field.

Class: ^777777Monster Egg^000000

A sword that can only be obtained by those who achieve sword mastery. The higher the degree of training, the more able they are to handle the sword.
Class: ^808080Two-Handed Sword^000000
Attack: ^808080180^000000
Property: ^808080Neutral^000000
Weight: ^808080200^000000
Weapon Level: ^8080804^000000
Requires Level: ^80808080^000000
Usable By: ^808080Swordman Jobs^000000
Str + 1
Dex + 1

If ^0000FFBash^000000 is level 10,
Increases the damage of ^0000FFBash^000000 by 50%.
If ^0000FFBowling Bash^000000 is level 10,
Increases the damage of ^0000FFBowling Bash^000000 by 50%.

^008080Nightmare Arclouse Card^000000
^008080Nightmare Mimic Card^000000

6635#
The hope from blacksmith around the world is mounted in this bottle.
Weight: ^8080801^000000
Used to refine an equipment without reducing the refining level or breaking if fail.
This item will consume regardless fail or success, the amount needed is increased corresponding to refine level.
Required number of bottles:
+7 refine -> +8 refine: 1 ea
+8 refine -> +9 refine: 2 ea
+9 refine -> +10 refine: 4 ea
+10 refine -> +11 refine: 7 ea
+11 refine -> +12 refine: 11 ea
Only applies to a maximum of +12 refine.

#
7530#
'Amatsu the Land of Destiny'
The people of Amatsu carry themselves with honor and tranquility. During your visit you should see the Beautiful Water Shrine. The Lord of Amatsu is much more open than rulers in other lands, they will talk to visitors and citizens alike. The Legendary Tree in Amatsu has many legends about it, such as the Legend that when you propose under its branches your marriage will be blessed. While in Amatsu you should see the Coy Pond, nobility of Amatsu keep wonderful gardens or plants, sand and rocks. Their careful balance and flow reflect the keeper's state of mind. Part of garden is a Coy Pond, these frolicsome fish are a delight to all. 
Don't forget to take photos of all these things, and show them to your Tour Guide.
Class: ^808080Generic^000000
Weight: ^8080800^000000
#
7531#
'Kunlun The Hermit Land'
Kunlun is a land in the clouds. Being so high in the air affords an unprecedented view of the world, it also gives a different mindset to those whom allow themselves to think freely. The Statue of Kunlun's Greatest Philosopher, stands proudly in the middle of town, ready to inspire great thoughts from all those that gaze upon him. All around Kunlun are spectacular Overlooks of the World. But there are particular spots that are exceptionally breathtaking, please watch your step. There is a small hill in Kunlun that is said to of been the Great Philosophers favorite meditation spot, you should visit there and see if any grand thoughts take you. No matter how great a culture is, there will always be a few among its citizenry that just don't 'get it'. Those in Kunlun's history that always thought small eventually truly shrank, and eventually disappeared. But before that time they had a Mini-town that they lived in on ground beneath Kunlun. That place is an object lesson against stagnant thinking.
Don't forget to take photos of all these things, and show them to your Tour Guide.
Class: ^808080Generic^000000
Weight: ^8080800^000000
#
7532#
'Louyang'
Louyang is a spiritual country, where the warrior spirit and clear thinking are highly prized. Such wondrous sites such as the Statue of the Man and the Tiger may inspire you to do your best. Louyang has a different perspective on healing the mind and the body. While Rune-Midgard relies on the science of potions, and Faith for healing, the Louyang healers practice their art at a Hospital. At a Hospital, your body will be cured by a system of body manipulations and diet. The beautiful Palace that is protected by the Great Wall of Louyang is truly a sight to behold for every visitor. To go along with their proud heritage of Martial Arts and spirit training, they often practice making their bodies more robust through exercise. Some of these exercises target the legs others the Lungs. Outside Louyang some practice their Shouting on the Tower. If you have seen all these sites in Louyang, you will have quite a few good memories to take home.
Don't forget to take photos of all these things, and show them to your Tour Guide.
Class: ^808080Generic^000000
Weight: ^8080800^000000
#
7533#
'Ayothaya'
Thoughts of transcending your limitations, and finding Life's perfect philosophy is Ayothaya's Heritage. In Ayothaya's history is great Philosopher that all Ayothayans seek to emulate. There are numerous statues representing this Philosopher exist in and around Ayothaya. You should visit them to see what differences and significance these Reclining Philosopher Statues mean to you. Part of the Philosophy involves many hours of meditation a day to keep balance in your mind and body. You should visit the Shrine in Ayothaya and meditate upon your life's journey. And when you complete your regimen of Exercise and Introspection you can refuel your body by visiting the Tom Yum Goong restaurant.  The famous soup made here is truly delicious. Don't leave Ayothaya without sampling the dishes there.
Don't forget to take photos of all these things, and show them to your Tour Guide.
Class: ^808080Generic^000000
Weight: ^8080800^000000

If its intimacy is Cordial, CRI +5, HIT +6,
Low chance to recovery HP 400 and SP 10 per a second for 5 seconds when dealing physical attack..
If its intimacy is Loyal, CRI +6, HIT +6,
Low chance to recovery HP 500 and SP 20 per a second for 5 seconds when dealing physical attack..

13469#
A sword with an intangible blade that seems to have no form but has no shape.
Attack the spirit of the subject and destroy it.
Unbreakable.
Drains 1 SP when dealing normal physical attacks.
Has an 8% chance to drain 30% SP from an enemy when dealing physical attacks.
The chance increases by 2% per refine rate.
If the refine rate is 12 or higher, the drain effect is increased in 20%.
^ffffff_^000000
If Rogue Classes equip this item, player can get additional effect below.
If equipped with Illusion Ancient Cape,
MATK + 100.
If the refine rate of both is 7 or higher, additional MATK + 50.
If the sum of their refine rates is 18 or higher,
has a chance of auto casting Bolt-type spells when dealing physical damage.
If the sum of their refine rates is 22 or higher, has a chance to increase the damage of Storm Gust, Meteor Storm, Lord of Vermilion and Heaven's Drive by 30% for 10 seconds, when dealing physical damage.
^ffffff_^000000
Type : ^777777Sword^000000 Attack : ^777777180^000000
Weight : ^77777790^000000 Property : ^777777Ghost^000000 
Weapon Level : ^7777774^000000
Required Level : ^777777120^000000
Jobs : ^777777Swordman Classes, Thief classes, Merchant classes.^000000

14152#
The Start your Journey Pack contains several items that will allow you move around Rune Midgard kingdom's cities so you can complete your job change quest quickly, get more exp for 30 minutes, and keep yourself heal during early adventure battles.
Also 20 Red Envelopes are given to help you get that last little bit of experience needed for that next level.  
Contains:
20 Red Envelopes
200 Novice Red Potions
1 Battle Manual
3 Rune Midgard Butterfly Wings
Can only be stored.
Weight : ^7777771^000000

14155#
The Weekend Hunting Pack contains the following consumable items to maximize your hunting efficiency.
You will earn 150% normal Exp for 5 hours,
Double item drop rates for 5 hours,
Avoid death penalty for 5 hours,
and be able to travel all over Rune-Midgard very quickly with the Town and Dungeon Teleport scrolls,
and restore HP at an astronomical rate with the Small Life Potion.
Contains:
10x Battle Manuals,
10x Bubble Gum,
20x Increase Agility 10 Scrolls,
20x Blessing 10 Scrolls,
10x Token of Siegfried,
10x Insurance,

10x Dungeon Teleport Scrolls,
5x Rachel Town Butterfly Wing, 
5x Schwartzwalt Town Butterfly Wing,
5x Rune-Midgard Town Butterfly Wing, and
12x Small Life Potions.  
Cannot be dropped or placed in Cart.
Weight : ^7777771^000000

Mdef + 10

If the user's base Int is 120 or higher, additional Int + 1.

^008080Golden Rod Staff [2]^000000
^008080Golden Rod Robe^000000

^008080Golden Rod Orb [1]^000000

Increases damage taken from Earth property attacks by 50%.

A box containing 30 Greed Scrolls, which each enable a single cast of Greed.\r\nThis scroll has the same restrictions as the normal casting of Greed; some maps do not allow Greed to be used.

Greed:
Picks up all dropped items in a 5x5 area around the user. This skill does not override loot-priority between players.

Weight : 1
Attack: ^8080800^000000
Weight: ^8080800^000000
Weapon Level: ^8080800^000000

A magnificent crown created to pay tribute to the 8th sign of the zodiac, Scorpio the Scorpion.  Attached to the crown is a Topaz gemstone, the birthstone for those born under this sign.

Increases resistance against Water property by 5%.
If refined to 7, when attacking, has a chance of autocasting Lv 3 Mild Wind.
If refined to 8, ASPD +2%. (Attack after delay 2%)
If refined to 9, has a chance of autocasting Lv 5 Frost Nova.
If refined to 10, ASPD +2%. (Attack after delay 2&), Atk +5.

16682#
A box that contains 1 Halter Lead. Once opened, the item inside expires after 1 week.
^ff0000This item is not refundable and can be traded and stored.^000000
An animal halter lead that summons a creature to ride on.
Mount creatures increase movement speed by 25%.
Cannot attack while on a mount.
^ff0000When this item expires, so does the mount.^000000
Weight : ^7777771^000000

This hat box contains one of four new costumes based on popular hats.
Take this box to Alora on the second floor of Eden Group and she will allow you to choose which one you want!

These costume versions give +15% EXP when killing monsters until August 14, 2013 and you will lose the normal version of the headgear.
Costume: Puppy Headband
Costume: Blank Eyes (no +8 tradein)

Costume: Bunny Band
The box can be traded and vended, but the costume headgears are account bound.

[Basic Service]

- EXP UP +20% 
- ITEM UP +20% 
- Increase storage limit +300 
^ffffff_^000000
[Additional Services]
When you consume Nyangvine item, all characters in the server get the following effect. 
- EXP UP (effective for 24hrs, 4 Nyangvine item) 
EXP UP +30% 
- ITEM UP (effective for 24hrs, 2 Nyangvine item) 
ITEM UP +30% 
- DEATH DOWN (effective for 24hrs, 1 Nyangvine item) 
50% reduction in death penalty 
- Advanced Package (effective for 24hrs, 6 Nyangvine item) 
All three above effects 
Attention! - When your character is under the effects of the buff, you are unable to select the same buff that is stackable or advanced package.

If upgrade level is +9 or higher, adds an additional chance of restoring additional 3% of damage as HP and additional 2% of damage as SP when performing a physical attack.

drop Serum

drop Poison Bottle

When refined to +9 or higher, ATK + 30, MATK + 30.
When refined to +11 or higher, has a chance to increase holy and neutral property magical damage by 20% for 10 seconds when dealing melee physical attack.
 
When equipped with Noble Cross and Hurt Mind,
MATK + 30, increase Duple Light's damage by 40%.
When refine rate of Noble Cross is +10 or higher, increase Duple Light's damage by additional 20%.
 
When equipped with Noble Cross and Kind Heart,
ATK + 30, increase Knuckle Arrow damage by 40%,
When refine rate of Noble Cross is +10 or higher, increase Knuckle Arrow damage by additional 20%.
 
When equipped with Old Parasol and Evil Spirit Glove,
MATK + 80, has a chance to auto-cast Soul Strike level 10 when dealing melee physical damage,
When refine rate of Old parasol is +10 or higher, has a chance to auto-cast Napalm Vulcan level 5 when dealing melee physical damage.
 
When equipped with Evil Spirit Glove and Red Lantern,
increase attack speed (reduce delay after attack by 10%), HIT + 10, MATK + 10%.
When refine rate of Christmas Guardian Tree is +10 or higher, has a chance to auto-cast Psychic Wave level 3 when dealing melee physical damage.
 
When equipped with Hurt Mind and Kind Heart,
increase attack speed (reduce delay after attack by 10%), increase long ranged physical damage by 10%, ATK+10%.
When refine rate of Christmas Guardian Tree is +10 or higher, HIT + 15, increase critical damage by 15%.

24072#
The armor worn over the armor provides additional defensive effects. It can be used as a single, but has little defense effect.

Reduce incoming physical/magical damage from Large monsters by 2%.
MaxHP + 10 per 1 refine level.
When refined to +7 or higher, reduce incoming physical/magical damage from Large monsters by 1%.
When refined to +9 or higher,  reduce incoming physical/magical damage from Large monsters by additional 2%.

SET BONUS
Large Shadow Weapon
Large Shadow Armor
MaxHP +1%, MaxSP +1%.


Type : ^777777Shadow Equipment^000000
Location : ^777777Armor^000000 Weight : ^7777770^000000
Required Level : ^7777771^000000
Class : ^777777All^000000
#
24073#

Increases HP + 10 per 2 refine rate.
When equipped with Bearer's Shadow set (Armor, Shoes, Shield, Weapon, Earring And Pendant), all stats + 1.
If the sum of refine rate is 45 or higher, grants [Endure] effect. Max HP is reduced by 60%.
Increases the maximum HP % value reduced by the sum of refine rate.

Shoes worn on top of normal shoes for additional effect. Can be equipped alone but the effect is insignificant.
Class: ^808080Shadow Shoes^000000
Weight: ^8080800^000000
Requires Level: ^8080801^000000
Usable By: ^808080All Jobs^000000
Increases the damage of Pierce by 20%.
For every upgrade level of ^008080Knight Shadow Shoes^000000, increases Pierce damage by an additional 5%.

24282#
A glove that is mounted on the hand of hold the weapon to elicit potential abilities of the wearer.
Only for Novice Classes

Class: ^808080Shadow Weapon^000000
Weight: ^8080800^000000
Requires Level: ^8080801^000000
Usable By: ^808080Novice Jobs^000000
Max HP +1000, Max SP +200
Ignores 3% of the enemy's physical defense based on the skill level of [Sword Mastery].
Ignores 3% of the enemy's magic defense based on the skill level of [Increase SP Recovery].
For every upgrade level of ^008080Super Novice Shadow Weapon^000000, ignores normal enemy's physical and magic defense an additional 3%.
If upgrade level is +7, MaxHP +5%, MaxSP +5%
If upgrade level is +9, MaxHP +5%, MaxSP +5%, SP recovery + 100%

When refined to +7 or higher, increase holy magical property damage by 3%.
When refined to +9 or higher, increase holy magical property damage by 4%.

SET BONUS
Magnus Shadow Weapon
Magnus Shadow Pendant
Magnus Shadow Earrings
increase damage of Magnus Exorcismus as a percentage equivalent to the sum of refine level.

SET BONUS
Magnus Shadow Weapon
Archbishop Shadow Shield
Ignores 40% of all race's magical defense, additionally ignores magical defense as a percentage equivalent to the sum of refine level of Magnus Shadow Weapon/Archbishop Shadow Shield.

It offers incredible power and mana at a great cost.

Consumes 100 HP every 10 seconds.
Consumes 1,000 HP when unequipped.

28130#

It seems to resonate with Ancient Hero Boots.
Cannot be destroyed in battle.

When Refine level is 9, Axe Boomerang damage increased by 40% .
When Refine level is 11, increase damage given to enemies of all sizes 15%.
When equipped together with Ancient Hero Boots and using physical/magical attacks, with a fixed rate for 7s STR +20, ATK +15%.

#
29148#
A stone containing the power of Leo Constellation that can be inserted in an empty slot of shoes.
Has to be mounted in the Angel Poring Shoes to fully demonstrate its power.
STR +1. 
 
When equpped together with Angel Poring Shoes,
MaxHP +5%, MaxSP +5%.
When Refined to 7, ATK +2%
When Refined to 9, additional ATK +3%
When Refined to 12, After Cast Delay decresaed by 5%
 
Warning: this item is excluded from all destruction protection given by Card items, Card separation etc.'^000000 
Class : ^777777Special Enchant^000000 
Usable by : ^777777Shoes^000000
Weight : ^7777770^000000

Class: Card
Compounds On: Shoes
Weight: 1
^FFFFFF_^000000
Adds a 3.5% chance of casting ^0000FFLevel 5 Fire Walk^000000 on the user when receiving a physical attack.
Adds a 8% chance of casting ^0000FFLevel 5 Electric Walk^000000 on the user when receiving a magical attack.
Adds a 3% chance of buffing the user for 10 seconds when performing a physical attack; Flee + 200.
Adds a 2.5% chance of buffing the user for 10 seconds when performing a magical attack; Increased Movement Speed.
^FFFFFF_^000000
^800080Set Bonus^000000
^008080Immortal Cursed Knight Card^000000
^008080Stephen Jack Ernest Wolf Card^000000
Aspd + 1
^800080Set Bonus^000000
^008080Stephen Jack Ernest Wolf Card^000000
^008080Immortal Wind Ghost Card^000000
Reduces the variable casting time of skills by 10%.
